mapper.select: SELECT H.hpid, dutyName, ROUND(ST_Distance_Sphere(POINT(127.0016985, 37.5642135), POINT(wgs84Lon, wgs84Lat)), -1) AS distance, AVG(star) AS star, COUNT(reviewNo) AS reviews FROM HOSPITAL H LEFT JOIN REVIEW_HOSPITAL R ON H.hpid = R.hpid GROUP BY H.hpid ORDER BY distance LIMIT 0 , 6

SELECT H.hpid, dutyName, dutyAddr, dutyTel1, dutyTel3, ROUND(ST_Distance_Sphere(POINT(127.0016985, 37.5642135), POINT(wgs84Lon, wgs84Lat)), -1) AS distance FROM HOSPITAL H JOIN EMERGENCY_BASE E ON H.hpid = E.hpid WHERE dutyTel3 != '-' ORDER BY distance LIMIT 0 , 4

SELECT hpid, dutyDivNam, dutyName, ROUND(ST_Distance_Sphere(POINT(127.0016985, 37.5642135), POINT(wgs84Lon, wgs84Lat)), -1) AS distance FROM HOSPITAL WHERE dutyTime8c != '-' AND dutyTime8s != '-' UNION SELECT hpid, '약국' AS dutyDivNam, dutyName, ROUND(ST_Distance_Sphere(POINT(127.0016985, 37.5642135), POINT(wgs84Lon, wgs84Lat)), -1) AS distance FROM PHARMACY WHERE dutyTime8c != '-' AND dutyTime8s != '-' ORDER BY distance LIMIT 0 , 5
SELECT hpid, dutyName, dutyAddr, ROUND(ST_Distance_Sphere(POINT(127.0016985, 37.5642135), POINT(wgs84Lon, wgs84Lat)), -1) AS distance FROM PHARMACY ORDER BY distance LIMIT 0 , 4
SELECT pillNo, itemSeq, itemName FROM PILL WHERE itemName LIKE '복합마데카솔연고%' OR itemName LIKE '게보린정%' OR itemName LIKE '알보칠%' OR itemName LIKE '판콜에스%' OR itemName LIKE '활명수'
